chapter.name: Overview
chapter.para: This is the Ext4 FS module documentaion of the Spruce system. This module is designated to cover as much ext4fs-specific doce as possible. One of the most important segments of such code is the ioctl system call backend. In case of Ext4 FS it is called ext4_ioctl and is situated in fs/ext4/ioctl.c.

The module covers the following Ext4fs-specific features:
Getting and setting flags Clearing non-allowed flags Getting and setting version Online resize Online defragmentation Delayed block allocation Test on unsupported operation
It is not recommended to run the Ext4 FS module alone, but if you know what are you doing then here are some hints which can help you to execute the module in several scenarios.

The module execution can be controlled by it's configuration file (ext4fs.conf in config directory). It consists of several lines each describing a single test. Lines must have the following format: CLASS_NAME OPERATION_IDENTIFIER.
